short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost AI chats with custom prompt templates. Easily manage prompts via Google Sheets. Supercharge ChatGPT & Claude productivity!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PromptGallery is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your experience with AI chatbots like ChatGPT and Claude. By allowing you to bring custom prompt templates directly into your AI chat conversations in Claude and chatgpt.

Key Features : 
1. Custom Prompt Library: Build and maintain an extensive collection of prompts in a Google sheet
2. One-Click Insertion: Insert your prompt templates into ChatGPT or Claude instantly with a single click

Getting Started
1. Install PromptGallery from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Grant permissions to your Prompt Templates Google sheet
3. Open ChatGPT or Claude in your browser and click on Prompt Templates button to access your prompt templates

Support and Feedback
We're committed to improving PromptGallery based on user experiences. If you encounter issues or have suggestions, please contact us through our email : kn.neeraj.2809@gmail.com
